definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: See also the Muggle Encyclopedia entry for the Wye River.
sentences.chinese: 參見《麻瓜百科全書》裏關於瓦伊河的詞條。

sentences.english: It's the same every year, packed with Muggles , of course, come on.
sentences.chinese: 每年都一樣，擠滿了麻瓜，這是當然的，過來吧。

sentences.english: Hagrid managed to rescue Harry before the Muggles had a chance to investigate and interfere.
sentences.chinese: 海格設法在麻瓜有機會調查干預之前救出了哈利。

sentences.english: The pureblood prejudice towards Muggle-borns is also largely insubstantial.
sentences.chinese: 純血統巫師對於麻瓜出身巫師的偏見其實也毫無根據。

sentences.english: Muggles who own this are in the Canary Islands.
sentences.chinese: 擁有這個地方的麻瓜在加那利羣島。

sentences.english: When my sister was six years old, she was attacked, set upon, by three Muggle boys.
sentences.chinese: 我妹妹六歲時，遭到三個麻瓜男孩的襲擊。

sentences.english: I've told you this over and over again, he kills Muggles for fun.
sentences.chinese: 我已經告訴你一遍又一遍了，他殺麻瓜是爲了樂趣。

sentences.english: Your blood has many magical qualities, but also some Muggle traits .
sentences.chinese: 你的血統裏有很多魔法的品質，但也有些麻瓜的特點。

sentences.english: Who'd want to frighten all the Squibs and Muggle-borns out of Hogwarts?
sentences.chinese: 誰希望把啞炮和麻瓜出身的人都趕出霍格沃茲呢？

sentences.english: Hogwarts Express at Times Square Hong Kong, the Muggle World.
sentences.chinese: 霍格華茲特快列車到達麻瓜世界的香港時代廣場。

sentences.english: Does it make a difference being Muggle-born?
sentences.chinese: 麻瓜出身會有什麼不同嗎？

sentences.english: Even if, as the same has been called Muggle Hermione does not matter.
sentences.chinese: 即使像赫敏一樣被人稱作麻瓜也無所謂。

sentences.english: But we, as Muggles, would be unable to comprehend how such a thing could be.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們，作爲麻瓜，可能回這樣的事情無法理解。

sentences.english: It is hidden from the Muggles by an orchard.
sentences.chinese: 它利用一片果樹林躲避麻瓜的視線。

sentences.english: The door to the Muggle Liaison Office banged open as he walked through.
sentences.chinese: 麻瓜聯絡司的門砰地一聲打開了，他走了進去。

sentences.english: If you're a muggle who wants to be a wizard, prepare for a disappointment.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是個想成爲巫師的麻瓜，這課程準讓你失望。

definition: Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳
